    @allure.story("Login completo con credenciales v√°lidas y cambio a franc√©s")
    @allure.description("Realizar login completo y cambiar idioma a franc√©s")
    def test_login_completo_y_cambio_idioma(self, driver):
        """Caso 3: Login completo en UATI + cambio a franc√©s"""
    
        login_page = LoginPage(driver)
    
        # === LOGIN COMPLETO ===
        with allure.step("1. Navegar a la p√°gina principal"):
            target_url = "https://nuxqa3.avtest.ink/es/"
            driver.get(target_url)
            time.sleep(3)
            print("‚úÖ P√°gina principal cargada")
    
        with allure.step("2. Tomar captura de la p√°gina principal"):
            allure.attach(
                driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="pagina_principal_caso3",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
    
        with allure.step("3. Hacer clic en el bot√≥n 'Iniciar sesi√≥n'"):
            success = login_page.click_login_button()
            assert success, "‚ùå No se pudo hacer clic en el bot√≥n de login"
            print("‚úÖ Bot√≥n 'Iniciar sesi√≥n' clickeado")
    
        with allure.step("4. Tomar captura del modal abierto"):
            time.sleep(2)
            allure.attach(
                driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="modal_login_abierto_caso3",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
            print("‚úÖ Modal de login abierto")
    
        with allure.step("5. Ingresar usuario: 21734198706"):
            username_success = login_page.enter_username("21734198706")
            assert username_success, "‚ùå No se pudo ingresar el usuario"
            print("‚úÖ Usuario ingresado: 21734198706")
    
        with allure.step("6. Tomar captura despu√©s de ingresar usuario"):
            allure.attach(
                driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="usuario_ingresado_caso3",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
    
        with allure.step("7. Ingresar contrase√±a: Lifemiles1"):
            password_success = login_page.enter_password("Lifemiles1")
            assert password_success, "‚ùå No se pudo ingresar la contrase√±a"
            print("‚úÖ Contrase√±a ingresada: Lifemiles1")
    
        with allure.step("8. Tomar captura despu√©s de ingresar contrase√±a"):
            allure.attach(
                driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="credenciales_ingresadas_caso3",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
    
        with allure.step("9. Hacer clic en bot√≥n 'Iniciar sesi√≥n' del modal"):
            login_success = login_page.click_modal_login_button()
            assert login_success, "‚ùå No se pudo hacer clic en el bot√≥n de login del modal"
            print("‚úÖ Bot√≥n de login del modal clickeado")
    
        # === MANEJO ROBUSTO DE REDIRECCI√ìN ===
        with allure.step("10. Manejar redirecci√≥n despu√©s del login"):
            print("üîÑ Esperando redirecci√≥n despu√©s del login...")
            time.sleep(8)  # M√°s tiempo para la redirecci√≥n
    
            try:
                # Verificar si estamos en una ventana v√°lida
                current_url = driver.current_url
                print(f"üìç URL actual: {current_url}")
    
            except NoSuchWindowException:
                print("‚ö†Ô∏è  Ventana cerrada - buscando ventana principal...")
                # Buscar todas las ventanas disponibles
                all_windows = driver.window_handles
                print(f"üîç Ventanas disponibles: {len(all_windows)}")
    
                if len(all_windows) > 0:
                    # Cambiar a la primera ventana disponible
                    driver.switch_to.window(all_windows[0])
                    current_url = driver.current_url
                    print(f"‚úÖ Cambiado a ventana principal: {current_url}")
                else:
                    print("‚ùå No hay ventanas disponibles - recreando sesi√≥n")
                    # Si no hay ventanas, navegar directamente a la p√°gina principal
                    driver.get("https://nuxqa3.avtest.ink/es/lifemiles-info/landing-intermedia/")
                    current_url = driver.current_url
                    print(f"‚úÖ Navegado directamente a: {current_url}")
    
        with allure.step("11. Verificar que estamos en la p√°gina correcta"):
            try:
                final_url = driver.current_url
                print(f"üìç URL final despu√©s del login: {final_url}")
    
                # Verificar que estamos en la p√°gina de landing intermedia
                if "landing-intermedia" in final_url:
                    print("‚úÖ Confirmado: Estamos en la p√°gina de landing intermedia")
                else:
                    print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  No estamos en la p√°gina esperada: {final_url}")
    
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  Error verificando URL: {e}")
                # Continuar de todos modos
    
        with allure.step("12. Tomar captura despu√©s del login"):
            try:
                allure.attach(
                    driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                    name="despues_login_caso3",
                    attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
                )
                print("‚úÖ Captura despu√©s del login tomada")
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  No se pudo tomar captura: {e}")
    
        # === CAMBIO A FRANC√âS ===
        with allure.step("13. Cambiar idioma a Franc√©s"):
            try:
                print("üîç Buscando selector de idioma...")
    
                # LOCATORS BASADOS EN EL HTML QUE PROPORCIONASTE
                LANGUAGE_SELECTOR = (By.ID, "languageListTriggerId_47212")
                FRENCH_OPTION = (By.XPATH, "//button[contains(@class, 'options-list_item_option')]//span[contains(text(), 'Fran√ßais')]")
    
                # Esperar a que la p√°gina est√© completamente cargada
                time.sleep(3)
    
                # Tomar captura antes del cambio
                allure.attach(
>                   driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                    name="antes_cambio_idioma",
                    attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
                )

    def check_response(self, response: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
        """Checks that a JSON response from the WebDriver does not have an
        error.
    
        :Args:
         - response - The JSON response from the WebDriver server as a dictionary
           object.
    
        :Raises: If the response contains an error message.
        """
        status = response.get("status", None)
        if not status or status == ErrorCode.SUCCESS:
            return
        value = None
        message = response.get("message", "")
        screen: str = response.get("screen", "")
        stacktrace = None
        if isinstance(status, int):
            value_json = response.get("value", None)
            if value_json and isinstance(value_json, str):
                import json
    
                try:
                    value = json.loads(value_json)
                    if len(value) == 1:
                        value = value["value"]
                    status = value.get("error", None)
                    if not status:
                        status = value.get("status", ErrorCode.UNKNOWN_ERROR)
                        message = value.get("value") or value.get("message")
                        if not isinstance(message, str):
                            value = message
                            message = message.get("message")
                    else:
                        message = value.get("message", None)
                except ValueError:
                    pass
    
        exception_class: Type[WebDriverException]
        e = ErrorCode()
        error_codes = [item for item in dir(e) if not item.startswith("__")]
        for error_code in error_codes:
            error_info = getattr(ErrorCode, error_code)
            if isinstance(error_info, list) and status in error_info:
                exception_class = getattr(ExceptionMapping, error_code, WebDriverException)
                break
        else:
            exception_class = WebDriverException
    
        if not value:
            value = response["value"]
        if isinstance(value, str):
            raise exception_class(value)
        if message == "" and "message" in value:
            message = value["message"]
    
        screen = None  # type: ignore[assignment]
        if "screen" in value:
            screen = value["screen"]
    
        stacktrace = None
        st_value = value.get("stackTrace") or value.get("stacktrace")
        if st_value:
            if isinstance(st_value, str):
                stacktrace = st_value.split("\n")
            else:
                stacktrace = []
                try:
                    for frame in st_value:
                        line = frame.get("lineNumber", "")
                        file = frame.get("fileName", "<anonymous>")
                        if line:
                            file = f"{file}:{line}"
                        meth = frame.get("methodName", "<anonymous>")
                        if "className" in frame:
                            meth = f"{frame['className']}.{meth}"
                        msg = "    at %s (%s)"
                        msg = msg % (meth, file)
                        stacktrace.append(msg)
                except TypeError:
                    pass
        if exception_class == UnexpectedAlertPresentException:
            alert_text = None
            if "data" in value:
                alert_text = value["data"].get("text")
            elif "alert" in value:
                alert_text = value["alert"].get("text")
            raise exception_class(message, screen, stacktrace, alert_text)  # type: ignore[call-arg]  # mypy is not smart enough here

        for error_code in error_codes:

                exception_class = getattr(ExceptionMapping, error_code, WebDriverException)

                        file = frame.get("fileName", "<anonymous>")
                        if line:

                        meth = frame.get("methodName", "<anonymous>")
                        if "className" in frame:
